abstract: YouTube, a unit of Google, took another step toward widespread live video-streaming on Monday, testing it with four Web video companies in a two-day trial, reports Brian Stelter on Bits.
snippet: YouTube, a unit of Google, took another step toward widespread live video-streaming on Monday, testing it with four Web video companies in a two-day trial, reports Brian Stelter on Bits.
lead_paragraph: YouTube, a unit of Google, took another step toward widespread live video streaming on Monday, testing it with four Web video companies in a two-day trial, reports Brian Stelter on Bits.
